general.gigTitle: convert website to app, ios app and android app, mobile app development, webview

sellerCard.description:
Hi üëã, I am senior mobile developer with +7 years experience. I can convert any kind of website into outstanding Android and iOS app. Your app will look just like your website, when you change the website, the app will also be changed automatically. 
 
If you have an Shopify store, I can turn it into a professional native app with great-looking design. The products and collections will sync automatically with your store. 

You‚Äôre going to love how easy and smooth your new app works. Don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out with your website. Let‚Äôs get started today! Thank you! ‚úåÔ∏è

description.content:
I will convert your website to Android app and iOS app. It will be a premium app and every functionality of your website will work on iOS and Android apps without any problem. 

 

The apps will exactly look like your website and whenever you make any changes to your website then the apps will be updated automatically. 


Features(iOS & Android): Included for all the packages!

  • Splash Screen(Animated, Native)
  • Rich Firebase Notification(with Link and Image)
  • Bottom Navigation Bar(PRO Design)
  • App Rating(ask users to rate app)
  • External Link Support(whatsapp, maps, instagram...)
  • App Permissions(camera, location, disk, microphone...)
  • Google Analytics(see how many users active)
  • No Internet Screen
  • Page Loading Screen
  • Pull Down to Refresh
  • Deep Links
  • iOS Native Swipe to Back


Extras

  • Admin Panel (75$)
  • App Intro Screens (50$)
  • AdMob Integration (50$)
  • In App Purchase/Subscription(150$)


CONTACT ME FOR DEMO


100% PREMIUM SERVICE GUARANTEED

100% APPROVAL GUARANTEED

PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE ORDERING


Thank you.


-

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have a demo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes, at first I will send you demo videos that will show you how the complete application works. 

Furthermore, In case you want, I will provide you a demo for your website to let you see how does it work!

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will test the apps(iOS & Android) before the submission. If you find any problem In the test, I will try to solve them all. You will complete the order after submissions is done. However, I will give you free support on releasing process if the app would be rejected by apple or google.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How does notification works? Is it unlimited?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It is unlimited. Furthermore, you will be able to push rich notifications with image and link. When the user click on the notification, the link will be opened in the app. I will show you how to push it to users. Please contact me to see its demo.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the apps have AdMob Integration to display ads?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! For free! You will need to send me the App ID for each (Android and/or iOS) and also the Banner ID and/or Interstitial ID and/or App Open ID of each. Just make sure you don't have AdSense on the website because Google does not allow you to have both.

questionsAndAnswers.question: People says "It is hard to publish an application on App Store". is that Right?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you compare it to google. Yes, It is hard. But If your website is well designed, and it is compatible with apple application policy then apple will accept the application. I have published tons of ios applications. Don't worry about that. Just tell me your URL, so I can check your website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you delivery the source code of the apps?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. The source code only included on the premium package

questionsAndAnswers.question: When I change the website, will the app be updated automatically?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, whenever you change the website, the app will be updated automatically.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you develop only android or iOS app? because I don't need both platform.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you only need an android app, I can develop it. Or If you only need an iOS app, I can also develop it. Feel free to contact me about that. So we can discuss deeply your needs

reviews.comment: The freelancer did an outstanding job helping me meet Google's requirements to upgrade my app to Android 14. Their professionalism and proactive communication made the entire process smooth and stress-free. They were quick to respond to my questions, explained technical details clearly, and delivered results that exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for reliable and skilled app development support!
it was very good. Probably we need talk more about some details that made everything a little longer beforehand but very good overall

Omer is a very good developer, saved me weeks of work, because he is specialized excactly for this task, produced in short time and with deep understanding of our needs. He added service which was not really covered by the delivery fee, and it was easy to communicate.

We will continue with Omer with our next project.

seller_response.comment: thank you for your great tip :) I am always here to work with you!

reviews.comment: Omer Bayrak truly delivered an AWESOME job with impressive speed and superb expertise in iOS development. His professionalism and code expertise exceeded all expectations, making working with him an absolute delight. His politeness and language fluency were the cherry on top, making the experience simply üëå!
Omer exceeded expectations. He was proactive and fantastic at attention to detail.
